title: Photos: Top Global Spas
author: Condé Nast; Kate Ahlborn; Alannah Arguelles
description: After visiting 10 spas in North America and seven day spas in New York City, VF.com scoured the globe for other top spa destinations. Here are our picks for the best of the rest.
